Project Nature: "(T26) To support bureaux/departments (B/Ds) in turning all government services online by 2024 and providing one-stop digital services by fully adopting the upgraded ""iAM Smart"" platform by 2025 so as to realise a ""single portal for online government services"" as set out in 2022 Policy Address (""PA""). Good coordination skills is a must; ;. Excellent written English is a must; ;. 2 years' experience in quality assurance (QAS) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in vendor management (VMG) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in managing G2B and G2C projects (GBC) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in the management and support of Government systems and services (GSS) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Good written English is a must; ;. At least 1 year's experience in work with the Government (GOV); ;. At least 1 year's experience in the management and support of Government systems and services (GSS); ;. 2 years' experience in quality management (QMT) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in vendor management (VMG) is an advantage; ;. Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the E&MSD; ;(a) Select the appropriate technical strategy and methods for the project; ;(b) To prepare and update technical manuals and project documents; ;(c) Attend checkpoint/progress review meetings, where necessary; ;(d) Act as a system integration lead to oversee, coordinate and manage all project implementation activities regarding, but no limited to, system hardware, software, network, application, security, other vendors or sub-contractors; ;(e) To coordinate relevant parties and perform any other duties related to the project; ;(f) To administrate, monitor and provide services for application software systems; ;(g) To provide daily support to the existing office automation systems. ;"
Requirements: "(a) Have a Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Engineering, or related IT disciplines, or equivalent; ;(b) At least 8 years' relevant working experience in the design, implementation, configuration, customization, and administration of application software systems; ;(c) Providing technical support and system administration for Lotus Domino/Notes and Confidential Messaging Application (CMSG); ;(d) Providing technical support and system administration for VMware vSphere; ;(e) Good planning, organization, communication and interpersonal skills; ;(f) Undertaking project management activities. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 7 years' experience in Domino and Lotus Script (DLS); ;. At least 7 years' experience in IT Application Development and Management (ADM); ;. At least 6 years' experience in Lotus Notes Mail Admin. & Technical Support (LNM); ;. At least 6 years' experience in Lotus Notes Administration & Technical Support (LON); ;. At least 3 years' experience in Confidential Mail System (CMS); ;. At least 2 years' experience in SSADM (SDM); ;. 5 years' experience in System Implementation and Maintenance/Support (SIM) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. At least 3 years' experience in work with the Government (GOV); ;. 3 years' experience in Government procurement/disposal procedures (GPD) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in IT service/outsourcing management (OUT) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in presentation (PEX) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in project management (PRM) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in IT procurement (PRO) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in software testing (STM) is an advantage; ;. 3 years' experience in Business Process Modeling (BPM) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."
